lesson.instruction: The verb "to have" is constructed by adding a prefix to na.
lesson.english: __I have/You have/He has/She has/We have/You all have/They have__ a friend.

lesson.instruction: When using "to have" in the past tense, the root na becomes likuwa na.
How would you conjugate the phrase "you had"?
How would you conjugate the phrase "you all had"?
When using "to have" in the future tense, the root na becomes takuwa na.
Translate the following sentence. Use the pronouns yeye and wao, and remember lakini is the word for "but".
lesson.english: She has a cat, but they will have a dog.
lesson.swahili: __=Yeye ana paka, lakini wao watakuwa na mbwa__ .
